metadata.title: CVE-2024-51755 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Twig is a template language for PHP. In a sandbox, and attacker can accessattributes of Array-like objects as they were not checked by the securitypolicy. They are now checked via the property policy and the `__isset()`method is now called after the security check. This is a BC break. Thisissue has been patched in versions 3.11.2 and 3.14.1. All users are advisedto upgrade. There are no known workarounds for this issue.

criterions.comment: php-twig package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
